title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 85.2 - Alternative procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 85.2 - Alternative procedure

State Regulations

In lieu of the signs required by section
85.1
of this Part, a registered
vehicle may have in its cab the original or a photostatic copy of its current
permit issued by the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
85.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
